targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, value as "Availability"
FROM history_text
WHERE property='availability' and $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "System Condition"
FROM history_text
WHERE property='system-condition' and $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Message"
FROM history_text
WHERE property='message' and $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Emergency Stop"
FROM history_text
WHERE property='controller/emergency-stop' and $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Functional Mode"
FROM history_text
WHERE property='functional-mode' and $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT time, value as "Execution"
FROM history_text
WHERE property='controller/path/execution' and $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  ARRAY_POSITION(array['UNAVAILABLE','AVAILABLE'], value) as pos
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='availability'
ORDER BY time desc

SELECT
  ARRAY_POSITION(array['UNAVAILABLE','PRODUCTION','MAINTENANCE'], value) as pos
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='functional-mode'
ORDER BY time desc

SELECT
  ARRAY_POSITION(array['UNAVAILABLE','NORMAL', 'WARNING', 'FAULT'], value) as pos
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='system-condition'
ORDER BY time desc

SELECT
  'Message' as name,
  value
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='message'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Firmware Version' as name,
  value
FROM history_text
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='firmware-version'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  ARRAY_POSITION(array['UNAVAILABLE','ARMED','TRIGGERED'], value) as pos
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='controller/emergency-stop'
ORDER BY time desc

SELECT
  ARRAY_POSITION(array['UNAVAILABLE','PROGRAM_STOPPED', 'WAIT', 'ACTIVE'], value) as pos
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='controller/path/execution'
ORDER BY time desc

SELECT
  ARRAY_POSITION(array['UNAVAILABLE','PAUSING','RESUMING'], value) as pos
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='controller/path/wait-state'
ORDER BY time desc

SELECT
  'Program' as name,
  value
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='controller/path/program-main'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Step' as name,
  value
FROM history_text 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='controller/path/block'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Clock Time' as name,
  value
FROM history_float 
WHERE device='${device}' 
AND property like 'controller/path/clock-time'
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Up Time' as name,
  value
FROM history_float 
WHERE device='${device}' 
AND property like 'controller/path/equipment-timer-operating'
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Cycle Time' as name,
  value
FROM history_float 
WHERE device='${device}' 
AND property like 'controller/path/process-timer-process'
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Cycle Count' as name,
  value
FROM history_float 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property like 'controller/path/count-cycle'
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Life Count' as name,
  value
FROM history_float 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property like 'controller/path/count-life'
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  'Fault Count' as name,
  value
FROM history_float 
WHERE device='${device}' AND property like 'controller/path/count-fault'
ORDER BY time desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time,
  value
FROM history_float
WHERE device='${device}' AND property='systems/feeder/equipment-timer-delay'
and $__timeFilter("time")
order by time desc

SELECT
  time,
  property,
  value
FROM history_all
WHERE device='${device}' AND 
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY time desc

list.definition: select nodes.props->>'uuid' as device from nodes where nodes.props->>'type'='Device'
list.label: Device
list.name: device
list.query: select nodes.props->>'uuid' as device from nodes where nodes.props->>'type'='Device'
